comment: Enables VR - 0: no VR; 1: SteamVR; 2: OpenXR.  (overridden by -vr, -xr or -novr command line options)
Factor to reduce field-of-view in VR, for LookCloser callback.
HMCS renders, 0 right eye, 1 left eye, -1 both eyes.
Enable multi-threaded rendering for VR (1: higher throughput; 0: lower latency).
Predict future head matrices for SteamVR. Only works with g_bVRParallelRenderThread enabled.
This will not display the companion window in VR (only HMD will show image in 3d).
Setting this will default the Mixed Reality Cockpit Cover on (1) or off (0). Can still be toggled in game.
